Grasshope,

Again, I am very sorry for the late reply.  Hopefully, all of this has been addressed with the new Ground Zone component.

I explained why you needed to set the construction on both of the Set EP Construction components here:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/questions-a...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/questions-about-outdoor-microclimate-map)

As for the reason why re-connection is needed, that is strange indeed!  My guess it that this resulted from a very old bug in the previous release.  This seems to be fixed now, as evidenced by my attached failure to replicate the issue.

-Chris
